The Finest in Flight
"Old Hands" at South American air travel . .. pub-
lisher Roy Howard, film director Henry King, and many
others . .. agree Panagra's de luxe Sleeper Service is the
finest, fastest and most luxurious South American serv-
ice. Comfortable main cabins have plenty of room to
move about, or stretch out in deeply cushioned lounge
chairs. Aft are regal accommodations for those who pre-
fer bed-size sleeping berths at night.
Full course meals, plus cocktails and Chilean wines
... rivaling any special fare you've ever enjoyed ...
are served you by the attentive purser and flight hostess.
The smartly decorated Fiesta Lounge - feature of
latest type Panagra interiors - is a delightful place for
refreshments, games or a companionable chat. And you
airport of call, brings new luxury. Panagra, pioneer U. S.
flag carrier in South America, has 23 years of experience in
pleasing passengers. In addition, you benefit by having at
your command the many offices of W. R. Grace & Co., a
50% owner of Panagra, established for nearly a century in
South America.
No Extra Costfor Optional Routings
WHEN YOU FLY PANAGRA in South America, you have
a choice of routes - go one way, return another with-
in Panagra's system, at no extra cost over low round-
trip fare. Optional side trips have rich rewards in
sightseeing. And interesting places to stay abound. So,
for more pleasure, plan on Panagra in South America
. as well as for your trip Round South America.
get tops in service . . . courtesy of Panagra.

properties.sfomuseum:description: Brochure issued by Panagra (Pan American-Grace Airways) promoting El Inter Americano service to South America; color illustration of people boarding aircraft with text “De Luxe South American Service / Linking the Americas Overnight by Air”; contains information about daily flights and choice of US gateways.
